author: Teemperor
body:
This header isn't valid C++ code as SingleGaussianState is a template
but we use it as a non-templated class in this header. It seems this
code is broken since a while and not used - beside the other orphaned
header GaussianStateLessWeight.h which hangs out in /src/. As we
anyway also have a copy GaussianStateLessWeight.h in /interface/ and no
one seems to use the /src/ header, we just remove this too.
title: Remove RCSingleGaussianState.h
